mosinstall.name: Tab Module
mosinstall.author: Soner Ekici
mosinstall.description: This module allows to show lots of modules in one position.

param.name: position
param.label: Position
param.description: Module position that the modules shown

param.name: cookies
param.label: Enable Cookies
param.description: If set to Yes, Cookie will hold last used tab between page refreshes

param.name: css
param.label: Use Module CSS
param.description: Do Tab module use custom css file

param.name: cssfile
param.label: CSS File
param.description: CSS File that using in the module if you choose custom css file above
